about_the_game:
Did you enjoy Akalana Islands in Pancake Sailor and you are looking for more?

Relax and discover Windy Islands. Try more racing with "Quick" and "Long Race".

Support MarineVerse team who developed a Free to Play Pancake Sailor, by purchasing this additional content.

Features

  • In addition to basic features included in Pancake Sailor..
  • Windy Islands - a new map to explore.
  • A "Quick Race" - sail upwind, around a buoy and back downwind. Compare your score against a global community of sailors.
  • A "Long Race" - a classic "triangle" race course with a countdown start. You will learn a little bit of real sailboat racing here.
  • Multiplayer - explore Windy Islands with friends.

Windy Islands Map




If you have a VR headset, you can also explore Windy Islands in Virtual Reality. The map is available in VR Regatta, when you reach a "Petty Officer" rank.
detailed_description:
Did you enjoy Akalana Islands in Pancake Sailor and you are looking for more?

Relax and discover Windy Islands. Try more racing with "Quick" and "Long Race".

Support MarineVerse team who developed a Free to Play Pancake Sailor, by purchasing this additional content.

Features

  • In addition to basic features included in Pancake Sailor..
  • Windy Islands - a new map to explore.
  • A "Quick Race" - sail upwind, around a buoy and back downwind. Compare your score against a global community of sailors.
  • A "Long Race" - a classic "triangle" race course with a countdown start. You will learn a little bit of real sailboat racing here.
  • Multiplayer - explore Windy Islands with friends.

Windy Islands Map




If you have a VR headset, you can also explore Windy Islands in Virtual Reality. The map is available in VR Regatta, when you reach a "Petty Officer" rank.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.11 ( El Capitan )
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Pro 1536 MB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.14 ( Mojave )
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 560X 4GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Pancake Sailor - Windy Islands

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel® Celeron® Processor N2820 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Relax and discover Windy Islands. Try racing with Quick and Long Race.
